email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to present you with a freight offer for 12,000MT of Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam on CIF terms. The vessel proposed is the OCEAN HARMONY, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 230m.

The laycan is set for October 10 to October 15, and the loading window is 48 hours. The initial freight quote is USD 45.50 per MT.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the prompt offer. Given the current market conditions, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 43.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Daniel Lee
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 44.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains October 10 to October 15, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 44.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Daniel Lee
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Santos on October 10, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Daniel Lee
Global Charterers
